title: Giselle Basler Freilichtspiele [Giselle Ballet Poster, Basel]
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
description:
The word Giselle is printed in large white text along left side of poster. The central image is a large black and white photographic image of a blured ballerina in mid-spin. Above left reads Basler / Freilichtspiele / 1959 / 19. -31. August / im / Rosenfeldpark in white text with a left justification.

Part of the Basel Outdoor Plays in Rosen feld Park
name: Poster
